sentences.sContent: We visited the ruins of the temple.
sentences.sContent_eng: We visited the ruins of the temple.
sentences.sCn: 我们参观了那个庙宇的遗迹。

sentences.sContent: I found myself in an ancient temple.
sentences.sContent_eng: I found myself in an ancient temple.
sentences.sCn: 我发现自己在一个古老的庙宇。

sentences.sContent: Can you tell us something about the history of the temple?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can you tell us something about the history of the temple?
sentences.sCn: 您能给我讲一讲这个庙宇的历史吗？

phrases.pCn: 天普市（美国加利福尼亚州西南部城市）
天普大学（位于美国东岸宾夕法尼亚州的费城）

trans.tranOther: a building where people go to  worship  , in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions
